Dec. 3, 2000 D West Midlands Brass Band Association Contest (Championship Section)
West Midlands BBA Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Midlands BBA Contest west-midlands-brass-band-association-contest-champ
Royal Spa Centre, Royal Leamington Spa, Warwickshire, England, UK 3 bands competed.
June 11, 2011, 5:11 p.m. Sept. 14, 2015, 8:36 a.m.

2 Staffordshire Band Andrew Culshaw English Heritage
3 City of Oxford Silver Band Nigel Taken Paganini Variations

Withdrawn Shirley Band Alwyn Green
